English: Here they come!
French: Les voilà !
Spanish: ¡Aquí vienen!
Italian: Eccoli che arrivano!

English: Alright!
French: Super !
Spanish: ¡Venga!
Italian: Ok!

English: Woohoo!
French: Wou-hou !
Spanish: ¡Ohhhh!
Italian: Uh uh!

English: Kick some Slag ass!
French: Bottez-leur les fesses !
Spanish: ¡Acaba con esa Escoria!
Italian: Fategliela vedere!

English: Keep in mind, Sergeant. Once those Shilkas get a bead on you, they can wreak havoc on the Strykers and your squad, so try to take them out as fast as possible.
French: N'oubliez pas, sergent : si ces Shilka réussissent à vous acquérir, ils réduiront les Stryker et votre groupe en charpie, alors essayez de les détruire le plus vite possible.
Spanish: Sargento, recuerda que una vez esos Shilkas te tengan a tiro, podrán destruir los Strykers y acabar con tu sección. Intenta destruirlos lo más rápido posible.
Italian: Attenzione, sergente. Questi Shilka sono in grado di distruggere gli Stryker e tutta la sua squadra: neutralizzateli il più velocemente possibile.

English: Let's move out!
French: En route !
Spanish: ¡Salgamos de aquí!
Italian: Andiamo!

English: Move! Move!
French: En avant ! En avant !
Spanish: ¡En marcha, venga!
Italian: Muoversi!

English: All units, this is Runner One. Radio check, over.
French: À tous, ici Runner Un. Vérif. radio, à vous.
Spanish: A todas las unidades, aquí Runner Uno. Condiciones de transmisión, cambio.
Italian: A tutte le unità, qui Runner Uno. Controllo radio, passo.

English: Runner One, Echo One, 5 by 5, over.
French: Runner Un, Echo Un. Cinq-cinq, à vous.
Spanish: Runner Uno, Echo Uno, 5 de 5, cambio.
Italian: Echo Uno, ricevuto forte e chiaro, passo.

English: Roger Echo, 5 by 5, over.
French: Reçu, Echo, cinq-cinq, à vous.
Spanish: Recibido Echo, 5 de 5, cambio.
Italian: Ricevuto forte e chiaro, Echo. Passo.

English: Runner One, this is Foxtrot One. Fair and readable, over.
French: Runner Un, ici Foxtrot Un. Assez haut et lisible, à vous.
Spanish: Runner Uno, aquí Foxtrot Uno. Todo en orden, cambio.
Italian: Runner Uno, qui è Foxtrot Uno. Forte e chiaro, passo.

English: Acknowledged Foxtrot One. Read you 5 by 5, over.
French: Reçu, Foxtrot Un. Je vous reçois cinq-cinq, à vous.
Spanish: Recibido, Foxtrot Uno. Te recibo 5 de 5, cambio.
Italian: Ricevuto Foxtrot Uno. Forte e chiaro, passo.

English: Golf One to Runner One. Reading loud and clear, over.
French: Golf Un à Runner Un. Je vous reçois haut et clair, à vous.
Spanish: Golf Uno a Runner Uno. Te recibo con claridad, cambio.
Italian: Golf Uno a Runner Uno. Ricevuto forte e chiaro, passo.

English: Understood Golf One, strong and readable, over.
French: Compris, Golf Un, haut et lisible, à vous.
Spanish: Comprendido, Golf Uno, alto y claro, cambio.
Italian: Ricevuto Golf Uno, forte e chiaro, passo.

English: Ok people, we're entering Slag territory now. Stay sharp. Runner One out.
French: Très bien, messieurs, on entre chez l'ALS. Ouvrez l'œil. Runner Un, terminé.
Spanish: Chicos, estamos entrando en terrotorio Escoria. Manteneos alerta. Runner Uno, corto.
Italian: Ok, ragazzi, stiamo entrando in territorio nemico. Fate attenzione. Chiudo.

English: Runner One to Foxtrot. Take out those Shilkas ASAP. We'll move in on the enemy base. Out.
French: Runner Un à Foxtrot. Détruisez ces Shilka au plus vite. On fait mouvement vers la base ennemie. Terminé.
Spanish: Runner Uno a Foxtrot. Acabad rápidamente con esos Shilkas. Avanzaremos sobre la base enemiga. Corto.
Italian: Runner Uno a Foxtrot. Distruggete gli Shilka. Noi penetreremo nella base del nemico. Chiudo.

English: Foxtrot One to Runner. The first Shilka has been neutralized. Out.
French: Foxtrot Un à Runner. Premier Shilka neutralisé. Terminé.
Spanish: Foxtrot a Runner. Primer Shilka neutralizado. Corto.
Italian: Foxtrot Uno a Runner. Il primo Shilka è stato distrutto. Chiudo.

English: Foxtrot One to Runner. Both Shilkas have been neutralized, over.
French: Foxtrot Un à Runner. Les deux Shilka ont été traités, à vous.
Spanish: Foxtrot Uno a Runner. Los dos Shilkas neutralizados, cambio.
Italian: Foxtrot Uno a Runner. Entrambi gli Shilka sono stati distrutti. Passo.

English: Received Foxtrot One. Wait for the air support to arrive, and then proceed to objective Milestone. Runner One out.
French: Reçu, Foxtrot Un. Attendez l'arrivée de l'appui aérien et rejoignez l'objectif Milestone. Runner Un, terminé.
Spanish: Recibido, Foxtrot Uno. Esperad a que lleguen refuerzos aéreos, y seguid con el objetivo Milestone. Runner Uno, corto.
Italian: Ricevuto Foxtrot Uno. Aspettate i rinforzi aerei e procedete verso l’obiettivo Milestone. Runner Uno, chiudo.

English: November One to Foxtrot. We're on site and ready to lend a hand. Out.
French: November Un à Foxtrot. Nous sommes sur place, prêts à donner un coup de main. Terminé.
Spanish: November Uno a Foxtrot. Estamos en la zona, preparados para ayudar. Corto.
Italian: November Uno a Foxtrot. Siamo sul posto, pronti ad aiutare. Chiudo.

English: Foxtrot One to Crossroad. Objective Milestone has been secured, over.
French: Foxtrot Un à Crossroad. Objectif Milestone nettoyé, à vous.
Spanish: Foxtrot Uno a Crossroad. Objetivo Milestone asegurado, cambio.
Italian: Foxtrot Uno a Crossroad. L’obiettivo Milestone è sotto controllo, passo.

English: Acknowledged Foxtrot. Once the USMC armor is on site, cover them while they enter Corazol. Your squad is to assist in securing the Demilitarized Zone on the border.
French: Bien reçu, Foxtrot. Une fois que les chars des Marines seront là, couvrez-les pendant qu'ils entrent dans Corazol. Votre groupe aidera à nettoyer la zone démilitarisée à la frontière.
Spanish: Recibido, Foxtrot. Cuando la marina estadounidense esté en el lugar, cubridles mientras acceden a Corazol. Tu pelotón debe ayudarte a proteger la zona desmilitarizada de la frontera.
Italian: Ricevuto Foxtrot. Non appena arriveranno, coprite i blindati dei Marine mentre entrano a Corazol. Dovete proteggere la zona demilitarizzata al confine.

English: Engage any units in the DMZ, but do NOT enter Northern territory. I say again, do NOT enter Northern territory. Out.
French: Engagez toute unité dans la ZD, mais ne pénétrez PAS dans le territoire du Nord. Je répète, n'entrez PAS au Nord. Terminé.
Spanish: Atacad a todas las unidades de la zona desmilitarizada, pero NO entréis en el norte. Repito: NO entréis en el norte. Corto.
Italian: Ingaggiate tutte le unità all’interno della ZD, ma NON oltrepassate i confini con il territorio del Nord. Chiudo.

English: Foxtrot One to Crossroad. The DMZ has been secured. Over.
French: Foxtrot Un à Crossroad. ZD nettoyée. À vous.
Spanish: Foxtrot Uno a Crossroad. Zona desmilitarizada protegida. Cambio.
Italian: Foxtrot Uno a Crossroad. La ZD è sotto controllo. Passo.

English: Understood Foxtrot. All sectors in the city have been secured. Well done. Crossroad out.
French: Compris, Foxtrot. Tous les secteurs de la ville sont sécurisés. Bien joué. Crossroad, terminé.
Spanish: Recibido, Foxtrot. Asegurados todos los sectores de la ciudad. Buen trabajo. Crossroad, corto.
Italian: Ricevuto Foxtrot. Tutti i settori della città sono sotto controllo. Bel lavoro. Crossroad, chiudo.

English: Foxtrot One. You are not to cross the Northern border. Return to allied territory, stat! Crossroad out.
French: Foxtrot Un. Vous ne devez pas franchir la frontière nord. Revenez immédiatement en territoire ami ! Crossroad, terminé !
Spanish: Foxtrot Uno. No crucéis la frontera del norte. ¡Volved al terrotorio aliado! Crossroad, corto.
Italian: Foxtrot Uno. Non dovete oltrepassare i confini con il Nord. Ritornate subito in territorio alleato. Chiudo.

English: Mines
French: Mines
Spanish: Minas
Italian: Mine

English: AA Position
French: Position AA
Spanish: Posición AA
Italian: Postazione AA

English: Enemy Base
French: Base ennemie
Spanish: Base enemiga
Italian: Base nemica

English: Bridge
French: Pont
Spanish: Puente
Italian: Ponte

English: DMZ
French: ZD
Spanish: Zona desmilitarizada
Italian: ZD

English: DESTROY AA SYSTEMS
French: DÉTRUIRE L'ARMEMENT AA
Spanish: DESTRUYE LOS SISTEMAS ANTIAÉREOS
Italian: DISTRUGGI I SISTEMI AA

English: SECURE BRIDGE
French: NETTOYER LE PONT
Spanish: PROTEGE EL PUENTE
Italian: RIPULISCI IL PONTE

English: SECURE DMZ
French: NETTOYER LA ZD
Spanish: PROTEGE LA ZONA DESMILITARIZADA
Italian: CONTROLLA LA ZD

English: Order your squad to board the Stryker.
French: Ordonner au groupe d'entrer dans le Stryker.
Spanish: Ordénale a tu pelotón que suba al Stryker.
Italian: Ordina alla squadra di salire sullo Stryker.

English: Mission Completed
French: Mission accomplie
Spanish: Misión cumplida
Italian: Missione completata

English: Mission Failed
French: Échec de la mission
Spanish: La misión ha fracasado
Italian: Missione fallita

English: Reclaiming of Corazol
French: La reprise de Corazol
Spanish: Recuperar Corazol
Italian: La riconquista di Corazol
